title: Ergo Paper Wallet
summary: The Ergo Paper Wallet is a straightforward and secure solution for managing tokens within the Ergo ecosystem. It is a self-custodial option that allows users to have full control over their assets. The wallet generation process can be completed entirely offline, enhancing security. A comprehensive video guide is available to help users effectively utilize the Ergo Paper Wallet. The GitHub repository for the wallet is also provided.

qa_pairs.question: What is the Ergo Paper Wallet?
qa_pairs.answer: The Ergo Paper Wallet offers a straightforward and lightweight solution for securely managing tokens within the Ergo ecosystem.

qa_pairs.question: How can the Ergo Paper Wallet be generated securely?
qa_pairs.answer: The wallet generation process can be completed entirely offline by downloading the standalone HTML file from GitHub, disconnecting from the internet, and opening the file in a web browser.
